title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not show up.
EB: Expected Result: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the software and navigate to the Available Items sector. 
2. Find the Data Source and click on its related icon to expand it. 
3. Observe that the column icons are not displayed.
